name: The library of the evil book
name_original: The library of the evil book
description:
Short game (< 5mn) made for the Godot wild jam #27

Once you pickup a spellbook, use the "1" or "2" button on your keyboard to use them. Move by pressing the left mouse button.

Features :

- 2 spells

- Sneak section

- Explosions (from your own fireball)

- A boss fight

Code made by me, Visual asset made by me, sound from https://www.zapsplat.com/.

Thanks to kwaki for testing the game <3
